SELECT DATE_FORMAT(od.order_date, '%Y-%m') as order_month, SUM(odt.order_dt_amt) as order_month_dt_amt, SUM(od.order_tot_price) as order_month_tot_price, SUM(pd.product_unit_price * odt.order_dt_amt) as order_month_tot_product_price, SUM(pd.product_unit_price) as order_month_tot_product_unit_price FROM tb_order od INNER JOIN tb_order_dt odt ON od.order_no = odt.order_no INNER JOIN tb_product pd ON odt.product_no = pd.product_no
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(#{order_date}, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(od.order_date, '%Y-%m')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(od.order_date, '%Y-%m')
HAVING DATE_FORMAT(#{order_date}, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(od.order_date, '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(od.order_date, '%Y-%m') desc
